text: Bobby, the Petrol Boy () is a 1929 German silent film directed by Carl Boese and starring Gustav Rickelt, Sophie Pagay, and Ruth Weyher. The film's sets were designed by the art director Otto Moldenhauer. It was distributed by the German branch of First National Pictures. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:Films directed by Carl Boese Category:German silent feature films Category:German black-and-white films
title: Bobby, the Petrol Boy
